name: Arthur BERNKNOPF and Dorothy Y. Bernknopf, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE
name_abbreviation: Bernknopf v. Commonwealth, Department of Revenue

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Arthur BERNKNOPF and Dorothy Y. Bernknopf, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.
attorneys: LeRoy Zimmerman, Atty. Gen., Robert Patrick Coyne, Deputy Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
442 A.2d 693
Arthur BERNKNOPF and Dorothy Y. Bernknopf, Appellants, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 1, 1982.
Decided April 2, 1982.
Arthur Bernknopf, Pittsburgh, pro se.
LeRoy Zimmerman, Atty. Gen., Robert Patrick Coyne, Deputy Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
